snippet: The wholesale club operator reported that net income rose 13 percent in the company’s second quarter.
abstract: Costco Wholesale Corp reports second-quarter profit of $394 million, or 90 cents a share, up 13 percent from $348 million, or 79 cents a share, in year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: The wholesale club operator reported that net income rose 13 percent in the company’s second quarter.

headline.main: Costco Sales Beat Wall Street Forecast
headline.print_headline: Costco Sales Beat Wall Street Forecast
